inn1.comm: and Guptill is underway as this one moves a bit to the leg side off a back of a length, as Guptill looks to work this away leg side for a single, but ends up being called a leg-bye by the umpire
Ryder gets solidly behind the line of this back of a length offering from Bhuvi
once again behind the line as this is played just to the left of the bowler
gets this one to swing in from a shortish length as Ryder fends this away to the leg side
Ryder fixed at the crease as he pushes this shortish length on middle and off to the off side

and it doesn't take long for Ryder to tee off as Bhuvi has been a tad predictable with this line and length. Ryder is able to flick this with that beautiful pick-up shot of his over square leg for the first six of the morning
prods forward slightly on the back foot to play this one to the leg side for a quick single
pitches this a bit further up on the leg stump as this is played away to the leg side
Shami has not got his lines quite right as this leg side delivery is helped down to the man at deep fine leg, but beats the fielder to the boundary, despite the fielder's dive
this time decides to slant the ball across Ryder, who sees this early as he slaps this away through point off the back foot to find the square boundary
much better line and length as this one is pitched just around middle and off, with that little hint of away movement after the tentative forward prod from Ryder
similar line to the delivery before as Shami gets this to rise off a shortish length to the keeper
Bhuvi still struggling to get his radar on track as he spears this one down the leg side
this time entices Guptill to have a play and a miss to this back of a length delivery outside off. Guptill was quick to draw the bat in
shifts his line a bit wider outside off as this one swings considerably away. I really thought this one should have been called a wide, but the umpire is unmoved
gets this to shape back into the batsman off a length, so there is definitely some movement on offer for the new-ball bowlers
once again fires one down the leg side as Bhuvi has been largely inconsistent so far. Was looking to get this to nip back in to the right-hander
teases Guptill with a length delivery outside off as he looks to have a go at it, but is a bit early in his shot as this one is pushed through to the keeper
shortish length just shaping away outside off as Guptill pushes this to the man at short cover
content to let this one outside off, and shaping away slightly, to the keeper
Ryder with a tentative forward prod to this shortish length slanting across him to the keeper
Ryder on the back foot as he looks to guide this back of a length delivery past the fielder at backward point, but the player makes a fine diving stop to his left to keep in control of it
Ryder looking very tentative outside the off stump as Ryder looks to play this off the back foot with his hands, as opposed to stepping into the line of the ball
once again pushes this cautiously to the man at backward point
short on leg stump as Ryder is in position to play his trademark pick-up flick, this time behind square leg, for a boundary, which fell just inches from the rope

and Shami gets him with a fuller one on a similar line as Ryder is in two minds to play this one, looking to once again go for the pick-up flick, but was never really in position for it to be executed properly
defends this back of a length delivery to the off side
pitched up and nibbling away late outside off, Guptill leaves it well alone
gets this one to shape away from a length outside off
shuffles over a few steps to this length delivery on the pads as he looks to guide this through the leg side, but finds the fielder
nice carry to the keeper as this one shapes away outside off
the line a tad wider outside off as Guptill is afforded room to get this away through point for his first boundary
plays this back of a length delivery off his hips, but can't find the single
bowls a back of a length delivery which rises appreciably outside off as Williamson shoulders arms
pitches this a bit further up as Williamson can not be teased into offering a shot
Shami pitching this again just outside off as Williamson shoulders arms
shortish length on middle as Williamson employs the pull shot, but is late on it as this one is bottom-edged onto his stomach, deflecting away towards third man. Ends up being ruled as runs
fires in a back of a length delivery which Guptill fails to get away to the leg side
pitched full and on the pads as this one swings away at the last moment as Williamson looks for the clip behind square. Ends up being called a leg-bye
gets some prominent inswing just outside off as Guptill angles this away leg side for a brace
right up in the blockhole as Guptill drives this one towards mid-off, but Jadeja is quick onto this one as he picks this up just to the right of him
speared down the leg side for yet another wide. Bhuvi has been uncharacteristically loose with his lines this afternoon
length just outside off which nibbles away slightly as Guptill shoulders arms
once again left alone just outside off by Guptill
solid on the back foot as this one is played back to the bowler
gets this shortish length on the leg side away behind square
pitched up on the pads as Guptill looks for the clip through midwicket, but finds silly mid-on
looks to work away this leg side delivery off a back of a length

Shami shifts his line outside off and is rewarded as Guptill's patience wears thin. Looks to cut this away off the back foot, but ends up giving an outside edge which is caught at a comfortable height by Ashwin at first slip. Shami has now struck twice, and both New Zealand openers are back in the hut early on
gets forward right away to this length ball on and around off
Shami decides to show off his bouncer to the Napier crowd as this one rears appreciably to Dhoni, who has to jump quite high to get his hands on it. Called wide by the umpire
slanting down the leg side, but just nipping back, as this one strikes the left thigh pad of Taylor
content to leave this back of a length delivery outside off to the keeper
shaping in from a fuller length just outside off as Williamson defends on the front foot
once again angling in, this time of a back of a length, as Williamson steals a run to the leg side
angling down the pads as Taylor gets away with a clip behind to deep fine leg
fuller one just outside off which is left for the keeper to collect
plays this one with the most minimal of footwork outside off behind square, but backward point is equal to the task
begins with a shortish length outside off as Taylor looks to cut it away
guilty of going down the pads as Taylor just eases this down to deep square leg
cuts this back of a length delivery down to the man at deep point
Williamson on the front foot straight away to this fuller one from Ishant
once again defended on the front foot by Taylor
length outside off which nibbles away as Williamson shoulders arms
angling down the pads as this is helped behind square towards fine leg
fuller one just outside off which nips away slightly upon pitching
pushes this off the back foot towards the fielder at silly mid-on
once again defended off the back foot by Williamson
looks to carve this behind square on the off side, and finds the man at third man
allows this length delivery outside off to shape away and be collected by the keeper
Ishant pitches this one just outside off as this is drilled straight to silly mid-off
back of a length and allowed through to the keeper
tries to get this shortish length away through the off side, but finds the fielder at cover
Williamson not particularly in a hurry as he thrusts forward to defend this offering from Ishant
punches this length delivery off the back foot towards deep extra-cover. Williamson was up high on his toes as he caressed this one through the gap
played away towards deep extra-cover to bring the over to an end
Taylor already commits to this short of a length delivery on middle and off, with the ball moving away at the last moment
looks to play this offering from Ishant with soft hands through point, but the fielder is up to the task
defends this fuller one to the off side
Williamson able to clip a delivery on middle and leg down to deep midwicket for a couple
Williamson content to play this off the back foot toward backward point for a quick single
full from Bhuvi as this is driven down to the man at silly mid-on
begins with a flatter delivery which is driven straight back to the bowler, who dives to his right to recover it
this time flighted on a similar line as this is played back to the bowler
Williamson down the track to drive this on the up to extra-cover
driven towards the off side by Taylor for a single
pushes this back of a length delivery to the right of Jadeja, who is quick on it
uses his feet but can't quite get to the pitch of it as this one ends up being played to the leg side
turns this away to the man at mid-on for one
too full from Ishant as this is clipped away sweetly by Williamson, who looked quite assured as he played that one away to midwicket for four
able to run this one outside off to the fielder at third man
defended off the back foot by Taylor
shuffles over to the off side to help this delivery angled down the pads to the fine leg boundary
full and heading down the pads as Taylor fails to get this away to fine leg. Taylor quite cross with himself

not going to let Jadeja off the hook as he shimmies down before lofting him between long-on and midwicket for a boundary. Kumar put in the dive at the boundary, but can't prevent it from hitting the rope
this time worked away to the leg side off the back foot
flighted just outside off as this is drilled straight to sweeper cover
advances down the track before playing this one straight to short cover point

once again decides to employ the lofted shot through midwicket as this time Kumar is able to prevent it from hitting the rope, and fires in a throw which has the NZ duo running hard to make their respective ends. Jadeja fires a throw to the other end, but the dive from Taylor was successful
in the slot as this is driven fiercely to the man at long-off

Williamson able to guide this fuller one from Ishant straight to the deep midwicket boundary for four. Poor bowling again from Ishant, who is letting off the pressure established from the opening bowlers
Williamson gets low to this fuller one just outside off as he looks to squirt this away behind point
shortish length outside off which is run down to third man
fires in a bouncer as Taylor is quickly into position to have a go, but is far too early into his shot as this one climbs over him to the keeper
an enthusiastic appeal for LBW. The umpire is nonplussed.
another bouncer outside off, this time the slower ball, as Taylor is once again too early into his shot
charges Ashwin straight away as this is played just to the right of him
defended back to the bowler by Taylor
slightly slower delivery which is defended cautiously
this time eases this flatter one down to long-on for one
played off the back foot towards point by Williamson
again down the track to this drifted delivery from Ashwin, but can't get it past Ashwin
fires one wide outside off as this is driven by Williamson towards the covers
fuller one which is drilled straight to the man at long-off
pushed to the left of the bowler down to the man at long-off for one
shortish length outside off which is cut away straight to backward point
shortish and just outside off, Williamson plays a flat batted pull to long on. That notches up the 50 of the partnership between Taylor and Williamson
length ball homing in on middle, Taylor milks it to mid wicket to retain strike
leg side delivery which is helped to fine leg by Taylor
shimmies down before lofting Ashwin gracefully over long-off for a wonderfully timed six. Just pure class and elegance from Williamson
punches this off the back foot to sweeper cover for one
length ball driven down to long-off for a single
defended solidly by Williamson to the off side
defended straight to the man at short cover point to bring the over to an end
driven handsomely to short cover point, who is all over this like white on rice
this time eased down to the man at long-on for one
pushes this back of a length delivery off the back foot to the right of Jadeja, who is quick to get to it
defended tentatively to the off side by Taylor
this time able to pierce the gap on the off side for a tight single
driven straight back to the bowler to end the over
played tentatively to the leg side by Taylor
heading down the pads as this is clipped to square leg for one
displays his front foot defence with the straightest of bats
eased off the pads down to midwicket for one
able to squirt this flatter delivery outside off to short third man for a quick-run single
worked off the back foot to midwicket to finish the over
defended on the front foot by Williamson to the off side
short and wide and Williamson punishes Jadeja with a square cut that just races to the boundary
on the back foot to play this away to midwicket for a single
driven straight back to Jadeja by Taylor
cuts this away outside off, getting it just past point, as the pair are able to run three
dances down the track as he drills this back to Jadeja, who picks it up quickly before firing it back at the batsman's stumps
defends this one solidly to the off side
driven straight back to Ashwin by Taylor
able to get this very fine outside off as this is finessed towards the third man boundary, but is reined in by the fielders
fails to get away this delivery to the leg side
eased down to long-on for a single
helped down once more to long-on, which means he will retain strike for the next over
flatter delivery drilled straight to silly mid-off
this time eased down to long-on for one
leans into  a drive down to cover, but the fielder is there to keep tabs on it
cuts this one away outside off
drives this one just outside off to the fielder at point
forward straight away to end this tidy over from Jadeja
driven down to long-on with another easy single. Also brings up the fifty for Williamson, who has been terrific in setting up the foundation
drilled straight to the man at long-off
turned away towards midwicket by Williamson for one
heading down the pads as Taylor looks to guide this past backward square leg
opens the face to this one pitching well outside off as this is held to just two runs
turned away to the leg side to end another successful over for India
shimmies down a touch before driving this fuller one down to long-off
defended tentatively by Taylor on the back foot
driven straight back to the bowler by Taylor
defended to the fielder at short cover
looks to guide this away from behind square on the off side
Ravindra Jadeja keeps it tight, Taylor drives, but can't beat a sliding cover. Just the single off that over - a good one for India
directed down to long-off for one
driven on the front foot down to long-on for one
punched off the back foot straight back to the bowler
eased down to long-off for one
turned to the straightish midwicket fielder
nudged to the left of square leg and that's another single
swinging in from outside off as this is eased to the fielder at mid-off
tries to squirt this away past backward point
clipped off the pads for a single
another single, this time down to deep extra-cover
pushes this one down to long-on for yet another easy.single
cracked to sweeper cover off the back foot
down the track to drill this fuller one towards deep extra-cover
full on off, driven along the carpet to long-off
the 100-run stand has come with an outstanding stroke. Williamson comes down the track and goes over cover, with an inside out stroke. Lovely execution and it looked so graceful
eased to deep extra cover, two was the call and two it will be eventually
urned wide of the fielder at mid-on, Dhoni asks the fielder to take it easy, he is shouting to him, but the throw comes in finally
a risk-free single to deep point
softly dropped in front of cover and a quick single taken
floated outside off, driven to sweeper cover
flatter on off, chopped to point
driven past a diving cover, down to long-off
gets forward to this one pitched outside off
slaps this fuller one away to the leg side which is hit at quite a rate of knots
drilled down to long-on to the fielder
fails to get this one going down the pads past short backward square
slaps this one on one knee down to long-on for a single
jabbed to the off side by Taylor towards the cover region
driven past a diving short cover point to bring up his 25th ODI fifty. Well played Rossy, New Zealand will want you to keep going
afforded width outside off and is punished with a late cut through the gap fora boundary
this time cut away a bit more square
eased down to long-on for an easy single
runs this one down to short third man for a single

and all that good work comes undone as this is lofted straight to Rahane, who is stationed at silly mid-off. Williamson deserved to go for a centruy, but it looks like he had a lapse of concentration there
gets forward to this flatter one from Ashwin
once again driven back to the bowler, beating his outstretched left hand
heading down the pads as this is turned away to short backward square
on the front foot to this flighted one from Ashwin
this time worked past a diving silly mid-on down to long-on for one
ends the over by playing this one back to Ashwin
shortish length just outside off which McCullum just gets away with a back foot cut
pushed off the back foot to the fielder inside the circle
late cuts this shortish length outside off to the man at third man
pushed off the back foot straight to point
solid in defence as he stays grounded on the back foot
just a hint of with as McCullum pounces on this one quickly to cut this away behind point for four
starts off with a bouncer which is quite wide as Taylor ends up getting an under-edge to it
slower delivery on off, Ross Taylor gets forward to defend it back to Ishant
spears this one down the pads as the umpire signals a wide
fuller one on the pads which is clipped to the fielder at deep square leg
length just outside off which is driven towards long-on, but is reined in before the boundary
able to get an outside edge on this one which ends up being run down to third man
back of a length and McCullum dances down to club Ishant back over his head to the boundary. Excellent way to finish off the over by NZ
starts off with a shortish length outside off which is cut straight to point

and Shami strikes straight away as he gets Taylor to play a tired shot, having a go at this one wide outside off which catches the outside edge on the way to Dhoni, who does well to snaffle it. Ends a fighting knock from Taylor
shortish length slanting across Corey as he lets this through to the keeper
defends this one to the leg side and takes off for a quick single
back of a length which is played with soft hands to the off side for another tight single
on the pads as this is helped off the hips for a single
is quite content to let this back of a length delivery to go across him to the keeper
this time Ishant gets the ball to jag back off a similar line, which hits Anderson on the stomach
short again and Anderson is onto this in a flash as he pulls this straight to deep square leg
full and on the pads as this is driven down to long-on for a single
plays this one with soft hands to the off side to take a quick single
low full toss heading down the pads as McCullum flicks this one straight to square leg. Should have done better as this was a gimme ball, and the bowler is Ishant, after all
length on middle which is sent up and over by Anderson to the long-off boundary with the cleanest of strikes
on the pads as this is helped off the hips by Anderson towards square leg
fuller length just outside off as Brendon tries to force this away to the off side
tests him with a bouncer which rises appreciably over McCullum, who looked to wallop this out of Napier
able to slap away this back of a length ball through extra-cover, but doesn't time it quite right, but still manages to pick up three valuable runs
pushed to the fielder at short cover point to end the over
low full toss which is driven straight down to long-off. Looks disappointed as he should have done better with it

where did that come from? Anderson just sent an Ishant back of a length delivery way over the square leg boundary for a huge six. This one was struck so sweetly that it just seemed to climb higher and higher in the air, before landing on the roof. Monstrous hit from Anderson. Ishant is thinking "Oh no, not again"
this time pitches it up further as this one is worked away behind square on the leg side
Ishant struggling to land a good line as McCullum sacheys to the leg side to loft this low full toss heading down the leg side over long-off for a boundary
this time straying on the pads as McCullum works this past backward square, who put in a dive in vain, as this one travels to the fine leg rope
gets forward to play this length delivery with soft hands to the off side, and is able to pinch a single in the process
gets forward straight away to defend this to the off side
quicker one heading down the pads as this is helped to the leg side for a single
Anderson just hammers this length ball outside off from Ashwin as he hits this against the turn over midwicket for six
this time backs away to cut this down to sweeper cover for a single
directs this one to the off side for a quick single
helped off the pads towards the leg side to retain the strike
back of a length slanting across Anderson as he just slams this back to the fielder at long-off
defends this one on the front foot towards backward point
advances down the track a bit as this is defended back to the bowler

Dhoni takes a blinder behind the stumps as he is able to hold on to an edge off McCullum's bat while standing up to the stumps to deter the batsman from going down the pitch. Excellent work by the captain as Bhuvneshwar celebrates some success finally
back of a length and defended by Ronchi to the off side
once again defended by Ronchi to end a successful over for India
Anderson pulls this shortish length delivery to the man at deep midwicket
gets solidly behind the line of this latest offering from Ashwin

driven down to mid-off before setting off for a tight single as Jadeja, one of India's best fielders, is on to it quickly as he picks up and releases the throw, but is unlucky to miss the stumps as Ronchi was well short
manages to squeeze a run down to long-on
looks to cut away this shortish one from Ashwin, but ends up hitting it back towards Dhoni on the bounce
finds a single with a hit down to deep square leg
length on middle and leg which is hit over the bowler's head, and beats a diving long-off to the boundary
back of a length and pulled away to deep square leg

Anderson just crunches this back of a length delivery from Shami well over the square leg boundary to once again land another ball on the roof. That makes it twice today from Anderson. This is really ominous for India
changes tactics by going round the wicket, and almost gets Anderson to edge one behind to Dhoni
fires in a bouncer going down the leg side as Anderson gets a whiff on it which carries well over the keeper to the fine leg boundary. Looks like it may have been a top-edge there
full and wide and clobbered by Anderson to a vacant extra-cover region for a boundary. Shami has simply been taken to the cleaners by Anderson. How many more can the southpaw get?

Ronchi does not care that Jadeja was the No.1 ODI bowler at one point of time last year. He just slog sweeps the heck out of this flatter delivery, with the ball climbing so high that it almost likes he has given a catch in the deep, but just lands over the midwicket boundary
slower one outside off which is carved to the fielder at sweeper cover
slaps away a shortish length delivery from Jadeja to long-off
this time there is no doubt about this clearing the ropes as Ronchi just gets down on one knee before depositing Jadeja high into the midwicket stand
this time flatter from Jadeja as Ronchi hammers him back into the same region, but this one not quite travelling over the ropes
pitches this outside off as Ronchi picks the gap at deep extra-cover for a brace
spears in a fuller one across Anderson as this is drilled down to the man at long-off
fires in a yorker which has Bhuvi sprawled on the ground as this is hit uppishly back to the bowler, but Bhuvi can't quite reach it
Anderson almost succeeds in dragging this fuller one just outside off onto his stumps, but is still able to eke out a run
gets this one completely wrong as he offers a full toss which Ronchi fails to get away as this is hit straight to long-on
full and just outside off as he commits hard for the first run, before returning for the second when the fielder bobbles the ball at deep extra-cover
low full toss across the batsman as Anderson clubs him over extra-cover for a single. Ends Bhuvi's spell as well
pushes one across Anderson who fails to get a bat on it, thinking instead that it will go for a wide, but the umpire is unmoved
full and wide outside off as Anderson times this beautifully towards extra-cover, with Kohli doing well to dive and stop it before the boundary

slices this full and wide delivery outside off to the man at sweeper cover, which also brings up a quickfire fifty from Anderson, and that too off just 30 balls. Can he double it in the limited time we have?
just drills this almost yorker-length ball straight back past the bowler, with the boundary riders coming into play
low full toss just outside off which is directed towards the leg side instead by the batsman
fuller one just outside off as Anderson has a swing and a miss
delivers this on middle at a fuller length as this is drilled down to long-on
full and just outside off as Anderson spoons this over extra-cover for a couple
Anderson is in a belligerent mood as he just heaves this fuller one from Ishant over midwicket for the fourth six of his innings. IPL contract beckoning my boy!
low full toss which is lasered down to long-off

back of a length outside off which has Ronchi playing late behind him, but I don't think he saw the fielder at backward point, as Kumar peddles back before taking a catch to his right to hold onto it. Ends a good supporting act from Ronchi, who came to the party at just the right time for his side

Nathan far too early into his shot as he ends up spooning this high over mid-on, but with no fielder there it ends up falling safely, but the action isn't over there as a throw from the deep while the pair go for two almost costs them a wicket as the stumps are thrown down. Replays confirm, however, that the batsman had made his ground successfully
excellent running from New Zealand as they are able to grab two runs with a hit down to long-on
full and drilled straight to the fielder at long-off. That one was hit so fast that when they changed the cameras the ball had already arrived to the fielder
quicker one just outside off which has Nathan quite late on it. Needs to hand over the strike to Anderson I reckon
slower ball outside off which Nathan again fails to get bat on ball to
bouncer outside off which is ruled a legitimate ball by the umpire despite it shaping away slightly. Ruled one for the over

fuller one going down the leg side as McCullum ends up hitting this straight back to Shami, who pockets it low around his knees to hold on to the chance. Even the cameraman had lost where that one had gone
this fuller one is played away to the off side by Anderson for a single
short and well outside off as Ishant gets this horribly wrong, with the umpire confirming with the signal for a wide
fires in a yorker that just misses leg stump as Southee backs away to hit him over the off side
full again as Southee hits this straight to mid-on, who takes a shy at the non-striker's, but misses the stumps

full again as Anderson hits this one straight to long-off, and wants two all the way as he hustles back to his end, with Southee able to make his ground at the non-striker's despite the throw from the deep
excellent ball again as Anderson just squeezes this out in front of point for a single

fires in a yorker outside off which has Southee shuffling across his stumps before attempting a paddle-flick over fine leg, but this one goes higher than farther as backward square is able to run it down and stop it from getting to the boundary

inn2.comm: angling down the pads as Sharma helps this off the pads behind square on the leg side. Ends up being called leg-byes by the umpires
length ball outside off which is left alone by the batsman
shapes away on a fuller length outside off as Sharma looks to play himself in
gets forward before playing this fuller one away to the off side
back of a length as Sharma plays inside of the line, with the keeper collecting behind
length outside off which is left alone by the batsman
full and on the pads as Dhawan clips this well towards deep midwicket, but doesn't get enough on the ball for it to reach the boundary
splayed down the leg side as the umpire calls a wide
Rohit solid in defence as he covers the line of this back of a length offering from Mitchell
full on the boots as this is played wide of fine leg
angling down the pads as Dhawan is able to get this away for a quick single
bowls a shortish length which rises on Sharma as he fends this away behind square on the off side
pitching outside leg as Rohit helps this along to deep fine leg
length outside off and shaping away as Rohit is solid in defence
Rohit content to defend this back of a length delivery to the off side
length ball and swinging away as Rohit shoulders arms
pushes this back of a length ball to the fielder at short cover
going down the pads as Rohit tries to get this past Ronchi
prods forward to defend the final ball as Southee finishes off a maiden over
gets this one wide outside off, and tailing away, as Dhawan is not enticed to go after it
shortish length which has Dhawan cutting this away close to his body behind square for a single
once again gets the line wrong as this heads down the leg side
just deflects this shortish length ball going away from him to the man at backward point

pitched up by Mitchell as Rohit drills this back to the bowler, who is able to stop it with his left foot as he falls face down, before mid-off comes into play to stop the ball from carrying any further, preventing a single for India
raps Rohit on the pads and goes for a huge appeal, but the umpire is not interested as this one, while pitching in line, may have a question mark over the height. Hard to say without Hawkeye though

how did that one miss the top of off stump? Rohit is drawn into playing a pull in front of square to this back of a length delivery, but completely misses the ball as he is far too early in his shot, with the ball carrying through to the keeper, but not before hovering just above the off stump on its way
full and just outside off as Dhawan times this one beautifully to the short cover fielder
angles this one towards the short cover fielder as he continues to look for the gaps on the off side
tests him with an accurate bouncer as Dhawan swivels himself into position before deciding to abort and let it through to the keeper
places this one beautifully through extra-cover with a sublime drive
width on offer as Dhawan plays this one late to get it behind square, but Williamson, at backward point, is able to move well to his right to stop this from getting any further
angling down the pads as this is clipped to square leg for a single. The batsmen wanted two, but the throw cancelled that prospect out
fires in a yorker which is directed towards the covers by Rohit

and his torturous vigil at the crease comes to an end as he is suckered into playing a hook shot which is hit straight to the man placed at deep fine leg, who takes a comfortable catch. Really silly shot from Rohit as he must have been aware of the fielder in the deep
begins by shouldering arms to this length ball pushed across him
once again can not be enticed to go after this wide one from Mitchell
just oozes class with this full-bloodied drive through the covers to this fuller one from Mitchell. It just raced across the carpet as the balance was simply superb
once again in the slot but he ends up mistiming it to the short cover fielder
Dhawan content to let this one go across him to the keeper
just pushes this one solidly to the cover fielder on the 30-yard ring
in complete control of this as he rocks back to pull Southee behind square with a lofted shot that carries to the boundary
unleashes a drive through the off side to this fuller one from Southee
drives this elegantly on the front foot to short cover
finishes off the over with a push down the ground
full and just outside off as Kohli fails to get this away
Kohli just dismisses this from his presence with an emphatic pull shot that has Mitchell smarting as he walks back to his mark. Smacks of Viv Richards with the nonchalant execution of the stroke
short and slanting away from Kohli as he drops his wrists. I think he was expecting the wide to be called, but when he sees the umpire is unmoved, has a nice glare at the bowler.
defended off the back foot to the right of Mitchell, who dives after it in vain, hoping for a chance on offer
low full toss which is expertly steered by Kohli to the vacant midwicket region. Kohli is announcing himself on these shores
and sensibly sees off the over by shouldering arms to this back of a length delivery
works this length delivery to the fielder at silly mid-on
almost succeeds in chopping one onto his stumps, but is lucky to get a fortunate bounce
in the slot and Dhawan drives this elegantly through the gap in the covers to find the extra-cover boundary
dropped shortish length which has Dhawan rocking back to pull, but he almost pulls this straight to Corey Anderson at square leg, who gets in a good leap before palming the ball over. Unlucky for NZ
another short one which has Dhawan playing this a bit later to get it down to deep fine leg
fuller one just outside off which is steered towards point
147 kph, and Dhawan diffuses the pace out of this one by simply punching the ball into the ground, with the bounce carrying over the point fielder, all the way to the sweeper boundary
150 kph, length ball which is defended to the off side by Dhawan. Cheer rings around the ground when the speed is displayed on the big board
147 kph, back of a length and Dhawan defends this one into the ground
150 kph, tries to squeeze away this length ball just outside off, but finds Jesse Ryder at the slips
150 kph, once again Dhawan is late on it as he mistimes this one towards mid-off
142 kph, fires in a short one which climbs appreciably as the umpire signals a wide
150 kph, finishes off the over with a shortish length ball going across him which Dhawan is wise to leave alone
fires this one wide outside off, and full, as Kohli has to stretch out to reach this and guide it towards third man
allows this one to go through to the keeper
on the back foot as he plays this one straight to backward point
nicely times this one off the pads as this screams to the square leg boundary
is able to chop this length ball outside off past the keeper, but not as far as the third man rope
fuller one which is defended on the front foot by Kohli to bring the over to an end
152 kph, plays this one close to the body as the ball travels behind to the leg side. Still manage to sneak a sneaky single
153 kph, just a mere push from Kohli finds the ball travelling all the way to the long-on boundary. He was well aware of the express pace on offer
147 kph, Kohli almost undoing his good work as he fends at this one just outside off
150 kph, steers this one straight to mid-on
149 kph, able to get this back of a length delivery to the leg side, and pinch a quick single
149 kph, simply pushes this last ball to the off side as Milne finishes well
Kohli leans into a drive which finds its way to the man at mid-off
able to angle this fuller one through midwicket for a brace
hits across this full length delivery from Anderson. Looks slightly embarrassed as he knew he could have put that away
guides this one going across him behind square towards third man
Dhawan in position quickly to this short one from Anderson, but then at the last moment checks his shot to fend this away to the leg side for a quick single
Kohli forward in defence as this one is played towards mid-off
147 kph, pushes this one across Dhawan, and at quite a rate of knots at that
149 kph, Dhawan able to get this away square on the leg side, and jogs to the other end for an easy single
149 kph, tries to push this one through the leg side, but is late in his execution

145 kph, this one angling down the pads as Kohli looks to help it along to the fine leg boundary, but the ball brushes the thigh pad on its way to Ronchi. The NZ fielders appeal, but the umpire is aware of the pad deflection
142 kph, delivers a short one which has Kohli ducking for cover. Called wide by the umpire
145 kph, plays this one with soft hands to the off side as they set off for a quick single, and Dhawan is able to get home safely despite the diving throw
149 kph, able to work this one away to the leg side and pinch a single
heading down the pads as Dhawan looks to flick this past the keeper
charges Anderson and then unleashes a drive, which isn't timed so sweetly, as this one heads towards deep extra-cover
short and wide as Dhawan is late on this as he looks to go after it
solid in defence as he plays this one back to the bowler
cuts this short one away to third man for a single
gets forward to defend this one to the man at mid-off
147 kph, uses the pace to get this one down to third man. The single also brings up the fifty-run partnership between these two
147 kph, times this one sweetly through midwicket, but is pulled back by the boundary rider on the leg side
143 kph, guides this one off the back foot towards third man
147 kph, mistimes this drive towards the leg side
150 kph, beaten for pace as Dhawan fails to get this away from him, with the ball just landing at his feet
145 kph, slaps this short one away to point on the bounce to end the over
going round the wicket as Kohli is content to let this through to the keeper
defends this one straight back to the bowler
almost chops this latest one as Kohli is through the shot early
spearing in on middle as Kohli is able to get this away through midwicket
defends this one back to the bowler
pushed to the fielder at short cover to bring the over to an end
able to steer this one past the bowler to the fielder at long-on
strides forward to meet this one before executing a quick single
shuffles across his stumps before playing Nathan off the back foot towards square leg
heading down the pads as Dhawan is able to tuck this round the corner
worked off the back foot but straight to the fielder on the off side
quicker and on off, Kohli jabs it away to cover, where Ryder makes a gallant, diving stop

and Anderson has struck soon after the drinks break as he gets Dhawan to spoon a pull shot straight up over the leg side, with Ross Taylor getting under it to take the catch. Big blow for India as Dhawan as looking to build from this platform he had laid
defends this first one to the left of the bowler. Very correct in his back foot defence, Rahane
on the back foot as he is able to work this away to the leg side for a single
Kohli content to shoulder arms to this latest offering from Anderson
strides forward to meet this one as this is played towards deep extra-cover
wide down the leg side from Anderson. India won't mind these extras at all
Rahane meets this one with a straight bat to end the over
able to carve this one through the point region for a quick single
steers this one straight into the waiting hands of short cover point
steered straight back to the bowler as Nathan throws in a dive
Rahane plays this with soft hands as he and Kohli are quite fleet-footed between the sticks
this time nudges this one down to the fielder at long-on
played off the hips by Kohli, but is unable to get the second
cut this away in front of square, with the ball almost getting to the extra-cover boundary
plays a classy punch down the ground which almost gets to the long-on boundary
Kohli presents the straightest of bats to the bowler
once again on the front foot as Rahane is keen on getting settled in
driven straight to mid-off by Rahane

McCullum pulls out a corker of a catch to remove Rahane as he lofts this one in the air towards mid-off, with McCullum running to his right before launching at the correct moment to get his right hand under the ball before it grazes the grass. What a stunner from NZ, who continue to exhibit solid skills in the fielding department
Nathan round the wicket to Kohli as this is defended back to the bowler
great stop by Ryder at short cover as Kohli looks to beat him with a drive
Kohli once again tries to get it past the covers, but Milne, running in from mid-off, is able to get a hand on it
prods forward to take out the malice of this McCullum offering
Raina exhibits how solid he can be with another display of his front foot defence
this time runs it down to the man at long-off to retain the strike
tests him with a shorter one which Raina passes with flying colours, for now, as he pulls this towards square leg
pushed to the off side by Kohli as deep extra-cover comes into play
tries another short one but this one sits up for Raina as he works it down to deep fine leg
played to the leg side by Kohli as he wants two, but Raina calls off the second run
and predictably Raina is given another short one which he somehow is able to get over the keeper to the fine leg boundary. The ball runs off the bat's face
another short one from Mitchell, but the umpire is feeling sorry for Raina as he calls a wide
Raina leans in before pushing this one straight to sweeper cover
flighted delivery on middle, defended off the inside half of the bat to the leg-side
played straight back to the bowler, who fields it with a dive to his rigth
this time plays this one away to the off side for a tight single
steered straight to silly mid-on by Kohli
spinning in on middle at 91kph, nudged away to square leg
inside-edge which goes towards the off side
Kohli on the back foot as he eases this towards square leg
another short one which Raina is happy to let through to the keeper
pulls this one off the back foot in front of square for a single
Kohli able to whip this leg-side bound delivery down to deep fine leg for a brace
driven down to the man at mid-off as they fail to pick up a single
this time he is able to get it away down to deep midwicket and retain the strike
Kohli has had enough as he advances down the track to clear Nathan handsomely over long-off. Excellent use of the feet there from the Delhi batsman
this time gets it away to square leg for a single. Moves to 49. His consistency is quite astounding
Raina prods tentatively forward to defend this one towards the off side
and Raina shows a more positive side by shimmying down to drive this to long-off
and he picks up his fifty with a gentle clip off the pads. 50 off 58 in his first innings in NZ. What a serious talent he is, and has been for India
Raina stoic as he defends this one on the front foot
and Kohli shows why he may very well be the best in the business in limited-overs cricket as he lofts Milne through point, with sweeper cover unable to rein it in before the boundary
140 kph, sensibly flicks Milne towards midwicket for a quick single
129 kph, just guides this slower ball with an angled face down to the fielder at third man
141 kph, deflects this shorter one fine down the leg side for a couple
142 kph, pushes this one towards point
128 kph, seems to be sapped of some pace as Kohli defends this last one back to the bowler
enticed to come down the track as he lofts Nathan, albeit not assuredly, towards deep extra-cover
just whips this with his steely wrists to midwicket
Raina tries to get this past Nathan, but a dive to his left puts paid to that
worked away by Raina to the off side for a tight single
whips this one away down to the man at long-on for one
straying down the leg side as Raina just helps this along with a powerful sweep that finds its way to the fine leg boundary
132 kph, pushes this one towards deep extra-cover for a couple

140 kph, you just knew in the back of your mind that it was only a matter of time as Milne gets Raina to play the pull, but hits it a bit too fine as deep fine leg takes a good catch in the deep to remove the left-hander. So ends Raina's little stay the crease
144 kph, pulls this riser outside off behind square to get off the mark straightaway
147 kph, drives this one beautifully, but straight to the man at short cover

140 kph, another short ball from Milne almost gets an Indian batsman in trouble as Kohli goes for the pull, but is late on it as this one spoons towards square leg, but there was no fielder in the vicinity. Lucky break for Kohli there
141 kph, on the back foot as Dhoni is able to squirt this away to the off side for a single
angled away to the leg side for a brace. These two are very quick between the stumps
short and wide as Dhoni has a go, but ends up getting a bottom-edge to the keeper
punches this one off the back foot, but straight to the man at mid-off
looks to get into position to pull before dropping his hands at the last moment to let it through to the keeper
crunches this off the back foot through the gap at point, but sweeper cover has got it covered
full and on the pads as Kohli flicks this down to deep square leg, with the pair booking it to make the second run before the throw from the deep, but it was close
127 kph, you know the press had asked Dhoni what he made of Milne. Here is his answer. Just slaps him behind point as this one races away, even beating an incoming third man, to the boundary
142 kph, defended off the back foot straight back to the bowler
138 kph, Dhoni ends up dragging this shortish length ball outside off onto his body
146 kph, Milne unlucky as he succeeds in getting Dhoni to edge this one, but away from any fielders as third man is able to recover the ball before the boundary
145 kph, negotiated carefully by Dhoni to the leg side
138 kph, ducks under this steepler from Milne to finish off the over
back of a length and clipped to the leg side for a single
MS Dhoni slaps Southee straight into the ground ,before Ryder gets behind it beautifully
Dhoni not at all impressed as he sees the shorter one from Southee, but realises soon after that this once is not even in the same zip code
fails to get this length ball outside off away
a little play and miss at the end there from Dhoni
content to let this wider one outside off through to the keeper
played towards the off side, but can't pinch a single
guides this one down to third man for one
steps inside this short and wide one before directing it behind square on the leg side
back of a length outside off which is let through to the keeper
leans into a drive but finds short cover point straightaway
tries to get this away on the off side, but instead ends up playing this one back to the bowler
just steers this one to the close in fielder on the leg side
looks to play that trademark fine sweep, but misses the ball
defended away to the leg side by Dhoni
Dhoni lurches forward before driving this to short cover point
caressed off the back foot, but once again finds the fielder on the off side
on the pads and flicked to short fine leg for a single

and some activity straightaway as Kohli works this one away to deep extra-cover, with the throw from the deep hitting the stumps. Kohli wants the second as Dhoni comes back for it. They ask for the third umpire, and it really looks tough and go, but is ultimately given not out

and Kohli shows he is not fazed by that one as he steps down to loft Anderson over extra-cover, but doesn't quite get it out of the middle of the bat, with this one falling safe just before the boundary
short outside off which is punched to extra-cover for a single
slaps this one away outside off for a quick single
this time Kohli is able to get under this one properly as he lifts this over long-on to get a boundary
shows off his finesse with a delicate late cut which beats the keeper on the way to the third man rope, but is just reined in before the boundary
and Kohli greets him with a slap through the covers which travels all the way to the extra-cover boundary
this time drills this straight back to the bowler, who does well to get a hand on it
and again he thrashes hard through the covers, but sweeper cover is able to cut it off before the boundary
in the slot as Kohli gets under this to clear long-off for a boundary. The bat had turned in his hand at the time of the shot, but he still had enough on it
and this time he slaps through extra-cover, but deep extra-cover is all over this
off the back foot and worked down to mid-on by Dhoni
dances down the track but fails to get this any further than the 30-yard circle on the off side

flicks this one going down the leg side straight to backward square, before setting off for a quick single, and is able to make it despite the throw at his end. Also passes Gambhir in the ODI runs list
slower ball which is pulled away, this time by Dhoni, straight to the same fielder, who is given another go at the stumps at the non-striker's, but is lucky to get home in the end
and Kohli just blitzes this with his strong wrists through the gap at midwicket for a boundary
this one goes just past the outside edge as Kohli looks to run this down to third man
low full toss which is flicked away straight to deep square leg

back of a length and Kohli skies this one so high as Ryder gets under it, but then at the last moment the ball gets away from him as he fails to grab hold it. Met with a huge cheer from the Indian contingent in Napier. Kohli survives this time, but he could easily have got out in the 90s, again
Dhoni looking to break loose as he is quick onto this one with a pull that he directs wide of mid-on, and travels all the way to the midwicket boundary for four
short again from Southee as Dhoni just lets this through to the keeper
length outside off which is cut away by Dhoni through point, but is cut off before the boundary

and Kohli moves up a rung as he pulls off a masterclass of an innings, stroking his way to 100 off 93 balls in his first outing in NZ. Fantastic effort from the young batsman as he goes level with Mark Waugh to get to 18 ODI centuries
played away to the leg side to end the over
ends up playing this one back to the bowler
stand and deliver as MS Dhoni just clubs this over the head of Anderson for a straight six
sensibly drives the next one towards the covers for a single
eschewed through the off side by Kohli as New Zealand suddenly seem a little more cautious out there
drags this one towards the leg side as Dhoni waits on it before pulling him behind square, but is unlucky to find backward square in the process
sacheys down the track before unleashing a crunching drive to sweeper cover
eases this one square off the wicket to deep square leg

takes a couple of steps down the track before hammering McCullum through long-on with a flat six. I hope no one actually attempted to catch that one, or they would find themselves handless, as it was hit at quite a speed
sticks his bat out to play this on the full to the leg side
clipped off the pads down to deep square leg for one
steered straight to the man at silly mid-on
once again in the gap at square leg as Dhoni retains the strike for the next over
142 kph, short and heading down the leg side as Dhoni turns this away to the leg side for a single
pushes this one gently past Milne, who seems to be struggling as he grabs his left side after delivering that last ball, with the batsman afforded that little bit of extra time to sneak in a run
too short as Dhoni knows the umpire will call this a wide, which he does
142 kph, Dhoni punches this off the back foot towards point, with Williamson diving to his right to stop this in its track. Good fielding effort there
this time drives this one down to long-off for an easy single
wide down the leg side as Kohli lets it go
steered straight to long-on to retain the strike
caressed down to third man for one
length outside off which Dhoni leaves alone as the umpire signals a wide
another wide outside off as the pressure seems to be getting to him
works this off the back foot towards extra-cover
Kohli leans in and plays a scintillating drive through the covers
bowls a shorter one which has Dhoni pulling this behind square
guides this one expertly to the fielder at third man
pushed to short cover point to mark the end of the over, and a long one at that
hits this one straight to mid-on to save any runs for NZ
unfurls a beautiful cover drive, but doesn't quite get the result he wanted as sweeper cover comes into play

and Mitchell strikes for New Zealand as he fires in a bouncer which Dhoni seems to be late on as he gets an edge on it before the ball loops over to Ronchi, who takes a good low catch. Dhoni walks off straightaway, and New Zealand's spirits are lifted in turn
and defended straightaway to the fielder at short cover point
goes past the outside edge of Jadeja's bat as he looks to have a go at it, but half-heartedly in the end

short of a length and McClenaghan may have turned the tide of this match with this over as Jadeja feeds a simple outside edge to Ronchi, who probably can't believe how easy that turned out to be. Jadeja storms off after a three-ball duck
Kohli has had enough and goes after Nathan as he just bludgeons this over midwicket for a huge six
pitched full on middle as Kohli is able to eke this out, but can't beat the inner ring
once again tries to penetrate midwicket, but the fielder coming from long-on is able to put in a successful dive to prevent the boundary
worked off the back foot powerfully to deep square leg
just pushes this to the fielder at mid-off
tries to get this away fine down the leg side, but ends up being hit outside the line on his pads

Kohli seems to be favouring the midwicket region as he once again lofts one in that direction, with enough power on it for it to reach the boundary. Kohli is truly playing a special knock here in Napier

full toss outside off and out of all the deliveries to get him out, this turns out to be the one as he just lasers this to Ryder, who won't make the same mistake twice, as he takes this rather nonchalantly, while the rest of Napier erupts. The Napier crowd is good enough to stand up and applaud this sterling effort from the Delhi lad
drills this one straight back towards long-on for a couple

a quicker one which rises high over the batsman's head as once again New Zealand are penalised for the height with a wide being called. Brendon can't believe it, but with Kohli out of the way, he can afford a rare smile
brilliant shot from Bhuvi as he leans back before ramping McClenaghan over the slip region for a boundary
presses forward to defend this latest offering from McClenaghan
carefully negotiates this last one to end a successful over for New Zealand

looks to squirt this one away behind point, but hits it a bit too well as backward point is quick to pounce on it before throwing this to the keeper who whips off the bails in time before Bhuvi could make his ground. India slowly slipping away in this run chase
defends this one away to the off side
tries to get this away on the leg side but ends up hitting it back to the bowler
this time is able to roll his wrists to get this to midwicket
played carefully off the back foot by Ashwin to the leg side
hits this one slightly uppishly to the left of Nathan, who goes for the dive, but can't get close to it
length just outside off as Ishant has a go at it
on the back foot as this is fended away to the off side for a quick single
fuller one just outside off which is slammed over midwicket for a huge six. Just seemed to hang in the air for the longest time, affording Ashwin enough of a chance to enjoy the moment
pitches this up a bit further outside off as Ashwin fails to get bat on ball
this time goes for the lofted shot over extra-cover, deliberating taking his hand off the handle after executing the stroke, to ensure it isn't hit a little too well as to find a fielder in the deep
ramps this one outside off down to the man at third man, and also ends McClenaghan's spell, as he finishes with an impressive 4 for 68. Seems to collect four-wicket hauls like stamps

Ashwin earns a life as he looks to clear Williamson over long-off, but this one isn't hit quite as well as he would have liked as this one dies before the boundary, evading a diving Brendon McCullum who can't quite get close enough as he runs backwards

Ashwin baited to try the stroke, and he goes for it, as he lifts Williamson in that direction again, but this time Southee is able to lurch forward to take an excellent diving catch. Nine down now and India will feel their chances have been nullified
steers this one straight to long-off for a single
flicked to fine leg for another useful single, but albeit a bit too late in the match
Ishant throws caution to the wind with a blitz to long-off, but can't get it further than the fielder
plays this one towards the covers as the pair make a tight single, before getting another one courtesy of the overthrow
full and on the pads as Shami just flicks this effortlessly through square leg, beating the converging fielders to the boundary
fires in a yorker which Shami is able to get away to extra-cover
Ishant backs away as he looks to hit this somewhere over the off side, but ends up dragging this just over the stumps, with the ball bouncing back to the keeper
and Southee bowls a lovely yorker on middle to get Ishant as he plays all around this one
